Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies will look to stop a four-game road losing streak when they take on the Washington Nationals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies lead the season series 8-4.
The Phillies have the fifth-best team on-base percentage in MLB play at.325.
Luis Garcia leads the Nationals with 17 home runs while slugging.438.
James Wood is 10-for-37 with two doubles, a triple, two home runs and four RBI over the last 10 games.
Bryce Harper has 42 doubles and 30 home runs for the Phillies.
Nicholas Castellanos is 15-for-36 with three doubles, a triple, two home runs and five RBI over the past 10 games.
Others: The teams play Sunday for the 13th time this season.
The Phillies lead the season series 8-4.
Washington has gone 38-42 at home and 71-90 overall.
Philadelphia has a 94-67 record overall and a 40-40 record on the road.
